location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: No. 1029 of 1821, Letter from Francis Warden, Political Department, Bombay Castle to Acting Political Agent at Qishm

mods.abstract: Letter with instructions on how to deal with cases of piracy or indications of a resumption of piracy relating to boats and construction of forts on the sea coast. Includes instructions on the case of piracy by Persian subjects and forwarding of complaints to Tehran, also communication with the Imam of Muscat [Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd] and the Resident at Bussora [Basra].
